question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. horse drawn carriage
B. suv facing the camera
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The SUV is in the foreground on the left, partially obstructed by a lamppost and red curb, while the horse-drawn carriage is further back on the street, clearly positioned behind the SUV in the scene.
